channel.title: Comments on Template (Jailbreak IOS 7) [Pictures]

item.title: Comments on Template (Jailbreak IOS 7) [Pictures]
item.dc:creator: @robonick8 robonick8
item.description:
@robonick8 wrote:

the elve age:

I heard the jailbreak for ios 7 had tons of chinese malware on it, I’ll stick with jailbreak of ios 6 thanks.

Lol not Chinese malware :P. The evasi0n team had a contract with some Chinese company that the Jailbreak would install an app called Tagi which pretty much wass the app store but contained illegal content and stuff like that. They no longer agreed with the contract and everything is back to normal. It only affected people in China. The jailbreak is safe but like I said developers are still working on making Tweaks compatiable with IOS 7 and also able to run on iPhone 5s due to 64 bit arch.

Read full topic

item.title: Comments on Template (Jailbreak IOS 7) [Pictures]
item.dc:creator: @robonick8 robonick8
item.description:
@robonick8 wrote:

KroniKz_:

Is there any goodmios 7 themes out yet?

Not quite yet. Most tweaks dont work yet on the Jailbreak since MobileSubtrate is not yet compatibable with IOS 7 but it should be compatiable very soon. The developers are working on making everything work on IOS 7 but you can still download anything that does not have to do with MobileSubtrate such as “Music Box” “Movie Box” “MxTube” etc

Read full topic

item.title: Comments on Template (Jailbreak IOS 7) [Pictures]
item.dc:creator: @robonick8 robonick8
item.description:
@robonick8 wrote:

[center][size=12pt]Hello Moparscape I am still in the process in learning HTML and CSS and since the evasi0n Jailbreak for IOS 7 is out I decided to makean alternate download source for it! If you could tell me what you think of it and what more I could do to make it better that would be very helpful ;D[/size][/center]

[center]What I will be adding

[ul][li]Slide page on how to use the Jailbreak Tool[/li]
[li]A list of other jailbreak tools for previous firmwares plus download links for them![/li]
[li]FAQ[/li][/ul]
[/center]

[center][size=14pt]Pictures[/size]



[/center]

HTML Code

[code]

Jailbreak IOS 7 - 7.0.4
  • Home
  • About Us
  • Support
  • Downloads

Jailbreak IOS 7

Install Cydia MAC OS X

Trusted Service

With our IOS 7 Jailbreaking Service we guarentee a full functioning, untethered Apple Device 100% of the time! With our well built software you will have a Jailbroken iDevice in no time!

24/7 Support

Have an issue, concern, or inquiry? We're here to assist! Send us an email at niclaquatra3@yahoo.com or follows us on Twitter and tweet whatever questions you have!

Easy Installation

With our amazing, desgined user friendly software it will only take a matter of seconds for your iDevice to be Jailbroken with Cydia installed. All it takes is a click of a button, no DFU mode!

Benefits of Jailbreaking

The Power of Cydia

After you have Jailbroken your Apple Device there should be this app called Cydia on your device. Cydia is where you download and install 3rd party software from developers all over the world! You can even create your own too! Its just like the Apple Store!

Install Tweaks

Tweaks are made my developers which is the 3rd party custom software that Cydia allows you to install onto your device. Tweaks alter your device's performance from springboard themes to adding more commands to Siri.

Winterboard Themes

Downloading Winterboard Themes to your Apple Device is one of the best benefits of Jailbreaking. Themes will change the apperance of your whole device such as icons, animations, keyboard and so much more.

Unlimited Free Music

To all music lovers this app is just for you! Music Box allows you to download as many songs as you want for FREE! All you have to do is install on your device through Cydia and search whatever song you like and download it!

Download evas0in Jailbreak


All Credits go to the evasi0n Jailbreak Team

Jailbreak Version: IOS 7 - 7.0.4 Untethered on all Devices

Windows Mac OS X

JailbreakMaster &copy 2013

[/code]

CSS

[code]body {
font-family: Cursive;
}
h1 {
font-family: Helvetica Neue;
font-size: 45px;
}
footer {
display: inline-block;
background-image: url(img/footer.png);
background-repeat: x;
padding-right: 15px;
padding-left: 15px;
margin-right: auto;
margin-left: auto;
}
.container2 h1 {
text-align:center;
}
#menu {
width: 100%;
height: 35px;
font-size: 16px;
font-family: Tahoma, Geneva, sans-serif;
font-weight: bold;
text-align: center;
text-shadow: 3px 2px 3px #333333;
background-color: #000000;
position: ;
border-radius: 5px;
}
#menu ul {
height: auto;
padding: 8px 0px;
margin: 0px;
}
#menu li {
display: inline;
padding: 10px;
}
#menu a {
text-decoration: none;
color: white;
padding: 8px 8px 8px 8px;
}
#menu a:hover {
color: white;
background-color: #3684EB;
}
#header {
background-image: url(“img/background.png”);
height: 500px;
width: auto;
text-align: left;
}

.sub_header {
float: right;
text-align: center;
font-family: Cursive;
margin-right: 185px;
}

.btn1 {
background-color: #5b331d;
color: white;
width: auto;
height: auto;
-webkit-border-radius: 3px;
-moz-border-radius: 3px;
padding: 14px 26px;
text-decoration: none;
font-family: Cooper;
cursor: pointer;
margin-bottom: -20px;
text-shadow: 0 1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4);
font-weight: bold;
transition: background 0.1s ease-in-out;
-webkit-transition: background 0.1s ease-in-out;
-moz-transition: background 0.1s ease-in-out;
-ms-transition: background 0.1s ease-in-out;
-o-transition: background 0.1s ease-in-out;
text-shadow: 0 1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
}
.btn-price {
background-color: #1BAEC4;
color: white;
width: 20px;
height: 30px;
-webkit-border-radius: 3px;
-moz-border-radius: 3px;
padding: 14px 26px;
text-decoration: none;
font-family: Helvetica Neue;
cursor: pointer;
margin-bottom: -20px;
text-shadow: 0 1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4);
font-weight: bold;
transition: background 0.1s ease-in-out;
-webkit-transition: background 0.1s ease-in-out;
-moz-transition: background 0.1s ease-in-out;
-ms-transition: background 0.1s ease-in-out;
-o-transition: background 0.1s ease-in-out;
text-shadow: 0 1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
}
.btn1:active {
padding-top: 15px;
margin-bottom: -1px;
}
.btn1:hover {
background-color: #B35300;
color: #fff;
outline: 0 none;
text-decoration: none;
}
.btn-price:active {
padding-bottom: 15px;
margin-bottom: -1px;
}
.btn-price:hover {
background-color: #07D1F0;
outline: 0 none;
text-decoration: none;
color: white;
}
#rows {
display: inline-block;
width: auto;
height: 250px;
text-align: center;
margin-bottom: 150px;
}
#row {
display: inline-block;
width: 1100px;
height: auto;
text-align: center;
}

.box_1 {
text-align: center;
float: left;
width: 300px;
padding: 10px;
margin: 40px;
border: none;
}
.box_2 {
text-align: center;
float: right;
width: 300px;
padding: 10px;
margin: 40px;
border: none;
}
.box_3 {
text-align: center;
float: right;
width: 300px;
padding: 10px;
margin: 40px;
border: none;
}
.col_1 {
text-align: center;
float: left;
width: 450px;
padding: 10px;
margin: 50px;
}
.col_2 {
text-align: center;
float: right;
width: 450px;
padding: 10px;
margin: 50px;
}
.col_3 {
text-align: center;
float: left;
width: 450px;
padding: 10px;
margin: 50px;
margin-top: 40px;
}
.col_4 {
text-align: center;
float: right;
width: 450px;
padding: 10px;
margin: 50px;
margin-top: 40px;
}
#ex4 {
width: 300px; margin: 0 auto;
-webkit-transition: all 0.5s ease-out;
-moz-transition: all 0.5s ease;
-o-transition: all 0.5s ease;
}
#ex4:hover {
-webkit-transform: rotate(-7deg);
-moz-transform: rotate(-7deg);
-o-transform: rotate(-7deg);
opacity: .5;
}
#ex3 {
opacity: 1;
transition: opacity .25s ease-in-out;
-moz-transition: opacity .25s ease-in-out;
-webkit-transition: opacity .25s ease-in-out;
}
#ex3:hover {
opacity: 0.5;
}
#ex2 {
opacity: 1;
-webkit-transform: scale(1,1);
-webkit-transition-timing-function: ease-out;
-webkit-transition-duration: 250ms;
-moz-transform: scale(1,1);
-moz-transition-timing-function: ease-out;
-moz-transition-duration: 250ms;
}
#ex2:hover {
opacity: .7;
-webkit-transform: scale(1.05,1.07);
-webkit-transition-timing-function: ease-out;
-webkit-transition-duration: 250ms;
-moz-transform: scale(1.05,1.07);
-moz-transition-timing-function: ease-out;
-moz-transition-duration: 250ms;
position: relative;
z-index: 99;
}
#fadein {
-webkit-animation: fadein 2s; /* Safari and Chrome /
-moz-animation: fadein 2s; / Firefox /
-ms-animation: fadein 2s; / Internet Explorer /
-o-animation: fadein 2s; / Opera */
animation: fadein 2s;
}

@keyframes fadein {
from { opacity: 0; }
to { opacity: 1; }
}

/* Firefox */
@-moz-keyframes fadein {
from { opacity: 0; }
to { opacity: 1; }
}

/* Safari and Chrome */
@-webkit-keyframes fadein {
from { opacity: 0; }
to { opacity: 1; }
}

/* Internet Explorer */
@-ms-keyframes fadein {
from { opacity: 0; }
to { opacity: 1; }
}?

/* Opera */
@-o-keyframes fadein {
from { opacity: 0; }
to { opacity: 1; }
}?
.cydia {
float: left;
margin-left: 25px;
font-family: Helvetica Neue;
}
#downloads {
text-align: center;
margin-top: 35px;
}
#downloads h2 {
font-size: 45px;
font-family: Helvetica Neue;
margin-bottom: 20px;
}
#downloads a {
margin-top: 30px;
margin-left: 15px;
}
#downloads p {
margin-top: 30px;
font-family: Cursive;
}
.install {
-moz-box-shadow:inset 0px 1px 0px 0px #0ebff5;
-webkit-box-shadow:inset 0px 1px 0px 0px #0ebff5;
box-shadow:inset 0px 1px 0px 0px #0ebff5;
background-color:#57c0e6;
-webkit-border-top-left-radius:7px;
-moz-border-radius-topleft:7px;
border-top-left-radius:7px;
-webkit-border-top-right-radius:7px;
-moz-border-radius-topright:7px;
border-top-right-radius:7px;
-webkit-border-bottom-right-radius:7px;
-moz-border-radius-bottomright:7px;
border-bottom-right-radius:7px;
-webkit-border-bottom-left-radius:7px;
-moz-border-radius-bottomleft:7px;
border-bottom-left-radius:7px;
text-indent:0px;
border:1px solid #0a0f01;
display:inline-block;
color:#ffffff;
font-family:Verdana;
font-size:15px;
font-weight:bold;
font-style:normal;
height:40px;
line-height:40px;
width:125px;
text-decoration:none;
text-align:center;
text-shadow:1px 1px 0px #0d1402;
}.install:hover {
background-color:#00a4fc;
text-decoration: none;
color: white;
}.install:active {
position:relative;
top:1px;
}
#copyright {
text-align: center;
text-decoration: bold;
}][/code]
